[1;32mParameter docstrings: =====================[0m

[1;34mBox2D: Whether to use the Box2D physics engine or not.[0m [1;31mlarva_collisions: Whether to allow overlap between larva bodies.[0m [1;34mfr: The tracking/simulation framerate (inverse of timestep) in Hz.[0m [1;31mdt: The tracking/simulation timestep (inverse of tracking framerate) in seconds.[0m [1;34mconstant_framerate: Whether the tracking framerate is constant.[0m [1;31mduration: The duration of the simulation in minutes.[0m [1;34mNsteps: The number of simulation timesteps.[0m [1;31mXY_unit: The spatial unit of the XY coordinate data[0m [1;34mNpoints: The number of points tracked along the larva midline.[0m [1;31mNcontour: The number of points tracked around the larva contour.[0m [1;34mpoint_idx: Index of midline point to use as the larva spatial position. Default is None meaning use the centroid.[0m [1;31mpoint: Midline point to use as the larva spatial position. Default is centroid.[0m [1;34mbend: Whether bending angle is computed as a sum of sequential segmental angles or as the angle between front and rear body vectors.[0m [1;31mfront_vector: The initial & final segment of the front body vector.[0m [1;34mrear_vector: The initial & final segment of the rear body vector.[0m [1;31mfront_body_ratio: The fraction of the body considered front, relevant for bend computation from angles.[0m [1;34muse_component_vel: Whether to use the component velocity ralative to the axis of forward motion.[0m [1;31mid: ID of the simulation. If not specified,set according to runtype and experiment.[0m [1;34mdir: The directory to store data[0m [1;31moffline: Whether to launch a full Larvaworld environment[0m [1;34mmulticore: Whether to use multiple cores[0m [1;31mstore_data: Whether to store the simulation data[0m [1;34mruntype: The simulation mode[0m [1;31mrefID: Selection among stored Ref configurations by ID[0m [1;34meval_metrics: Evaluation metrics to use[0m [1;31mcycle_curve_metrics: < No docstring available >[0m [1;34mnorm_modes: Normalization modes to use[0m [1;31meval_modes: Evaluation modes to use[0m [1;34mmodelIDs: Selection among stored Model configurations by ID[0m [1;31mdataset_ids: The ids for the generated datasets[0m [1;34mN: Number of agents per model ID[0m
